回复： 疯言癫语说单词。 submitted at 2002-4-13 2:23:00再厉害(formidable, redoubtable)也厉害不过咱们的荷花仙子啦。好多单词俺自己也掌握得不好，拿出来抖一抖，拾掇拾掇，自己也
Aerospace is one of the last redoubts of economic nationalism ., 航空业是经济国家主义最后的堡垒之一.
He soon proved himself a redoubtable warrior , and won the respect of other soldiers ., 他很快证明他自己是一个令人起敬的勇士 , 并赢得了其他士兵的尊重.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: from Old French redoutable, from redouter 'to fear', from re- (expressing intensive force) + douter 'to doubt'

entry.def: If you describe someone as redoubtable, you respect them because they have a very strong character, even though you are slightly afraid of them.

example.tran: 令人敬畏的布鲁克斯先生

sentences.sentence: "a tougher and more redoubtable adversary than the heel-clicking, jackbooted fanatic"- G.H.Johnston
"something unnerving and prisonlike about high gray wall"
